Portfolio

WordPress Page Management Patch

February 10, 2009

Scrap my last post on listing page numbers and check this plugin out instead which will list ALL the pages in WordPress – ideal for when you are using WordPress as a CMS and have a large number of pages.  Read and download below:

Marshin Software – Open Source – WordPress Page Management Fix

The Pages feature of WordPress allows it to be used as a lightweight CMS. Unfortunately its implementation can leave a lot to be desired, and it’s clear that it was never envisioned that a single install would have more than a few dozen Pages. When an install reaches a large number of Pages, the Page Management screen becomes unbearably slow to load, easily taking 30 seconds or more. More critically, when there are hundreds of Pages the screen will often fail to load completely, either by timing out or because of a php memory_limit error. </p>
